Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Projektledare Digitalisering
description:
Om rollen
   

  

 I rollen som projektledare hos oss på Sopra Steria är du en viktig del i leveransen till våra kunder. I våra projekt kommer du röra dig i gränslandet mellan IT och verksamhet och varje dag få användning av din förmåga att leda, entusiasmera och motivera dina medarbetare till självstyrning och samarbete. Projekten är av olika karaktär, stora som små, med kollegor från Sopra Steria nationellt men även med kollegor hos våra kunder.
   

  

 Som projektledare tror vi att du är väl bevandrad inom klassiska projektmetoder likväl som agila ramverket och att du har god erfarenhet från ledande roller i införandeprojekt/implementationsprojekt eller utvecklingsprojekt för digitala lösningar. För oss är det viktigt att du är van att arbeta med kunder, beställare och andra intressenter i komplexa miljöer då vi ofta är ute på avancerade uppdrag. Vi tror att du har ett genuint intresse för digitalisering och tekniska lösningar och att du delar vår vision om att förenkla och förbättra människors vardag genom innovativa lösningar för en hållbar och jämställd framtid.
   

  

**Om dig**
* 7 års + erfarenhet av projektledning inom digitalisering
* God vana att driva tekniska leveranser/implementationsprojekt på plats hos kund
* Van att genomföra uppföljning och rapportering enligt överenskommen process
* Ha ett gott affärssinne som möjliggör delaktighet i affärsutveckling hos kund
* Har en relevant högskole- eller universitetsutbildning
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska
* Meriterande om du är certifierad inom PMI, Prince2 eller liknande
* Meriterande om du innehar konsulterfarenhet sedan tidigare
* Meriterande om du har branscherfarenhet från sektorerna hälsa-och sjukvård, energi eller telekom


**Varför välja Sopra Steria**
* Fokus på kompetensutveckling och din personliga utveckling - vi kallar det för Power of sharing
* Stark företagskultur - utsedda till Sveriges bästa arbetsplats av Great Place to Work
* Europas ledande konsultbolag inom digitalisering med internationell närvaro. Läs mer om oss här


**Ansökan**
 I denna process arbetar vi med löpande urval, så ansök redan idag genom att enkelt ladda upp ditt CV eller länka direkt till ditt LinkedIn-konto via annonsen. Om det fortfarande finns något du funderar över är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Marie Berg, [email protected]
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att få höra ifrån dig!
   

  

 Sopra Steria har kunder och projekt som kan kräva säkerhetsgodkännande på olika nivåer.
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Senior Data Modeler
description:
**Job ID: 26594**




  
 





 We are Nordea. We have a 200-year history of supporting and growing the Nordic economies and our values are deeply rooted in these open, progressive and collaborative societies. As one of the biggest employers in the Nordics, Poland, and Estonia, you have excellent opportunities to evolve, develop and move forward with us.  
 





  
 





 We enable dreams and aspirations for a greater good.
 





  
 





 We build relationships. We add a personal touch to everything we do – when advising our customers, collaborating with colleagues and meeting our potential candidates.
 





  
 





 We learn and develop. We take pride in being experts and thinking ahead. We use our expertise to meet our customers’ needs, from the simplest to the most complex. We bring a growth mindset to our work that enables us to focus on the broader perspective in our daily challenges.
 





  
 





 We lead change. We are responsible and aware of the impact of our decisions, both for our customers and for our local and global communities. Mindful of our responsibility towards current and future generations, we have made sustainability an integrated part of our business strategy.
 





  
 




**About our team**





  
 





 Meet the Common Data Warehouse Requirements and Analysis team. We are responsible for building the bank’s Common Data Warehousing solution using state of the art cloud solutions. We add value by providing expert analysts and data modelling capabilities and expertise in the data warehousing and data integration areas for many solutions in the bank based on cloud-based technologies like Snowflake, and many other modern technologies.  
 





  
 





 Our team specializes in data analysis, data modelling, and data architecture. As IT Analyst you will play a crucial role in project development lifecycle. 
 





  
 





 Our technology stack includes, but is not limited to: Snowflake, DataStage, ETL Architecture, Cloud-based databases, Data Mesh, Data Vault. 
 







 We are looking for an IT Analyst (Data Modeller) to perform data analysis and data model transformation tasks. You will be working as an interface between business and IT to help translate the business requirements into IT mappings, as well as help understand data patterns and design innovative solutions. 
 





  
 



**What you will be doing:**



* Perform complex data analysis to help IT clarify requirements towards business and test use cases
* Map source data to target data models in the most optimal way (financial services logical data model)
* Act as technical SME and help IT development teams in understanding the requirements



  
 





 This is the right role for you if you have a passion for data analysis and problem solving. You are exceptionally good in interpersonal communications and proficient in English language. 
 





  
 



**Your background and skills include:**



* A degree in Computer Science or related field.
* At least 5 years’ experience in IT.
* Have worked with requirement management.
* Experience of working in multinational virtual teams.
* Understanding of Data Warehousing industry standards.
* Understanding of ETL/BI/Data Analytics/Data Modelling processes.
* Experience in writing SQL.
* Have good English language skills to freely communicate with stakeholders
* Communicative Swedish language skills



  
 



**It would be ideal if you also:**



* Having experience with Snowflake
* Having knowledge of Data Mesh, Data Virtualization, Data Vault
* Having experience working in SAFe environment.



  
 



**What we offer**




  
 





 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics, and traits make us stronger together.  We offer a full-time employment agreemen with various benefits based on your location, which may include private health and life insurance, learning opportunities, holiday subsidies, bonuses, special banking offers and many more.
 





  
 





 We treasure flexibility. That is why we offer a hybrid working model, where you can experience both working from our offices and from home (2-3 days from the office).
 





  
 





 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 



**Next steps**




  
 





 Submit your application no later than 31/01/2025.
 





  
 





 For more information, you’re welcome to contact Łukasz Borek. 
 





  
 





 For union information, please contact Finansförbundet at finansforbundet@nordea.com or SACO at SacoNordea@nordea.com.

title: Projektledare
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 Vi söker nu en erfaren projektledare till vår affärsenhet Global Technology Operations (GTO) och enheten Dedicated Client Projects (DCP), som skräddarsyr smarta konsultlösningar för våra kunder.
   

  

 Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär som senior projektledare i en trygg och stabil miljö? Hos oss får du möjligheten att arbeta i ett stort multinationellt företag med välfungerande strukturer och seniora kompetenta kollegor.
   

  

 Du kommer att leda viktiga projekt för våra kunder, som oftast är stora företag eller myndigheter. Här får du chansen att lära dig mycket och arbeta med komplexa, utmanande uppdrag, som kommer att inspirera dig varje dag.
   

  

 Välkommen till en arbetsplats där din erfarenhet och kompetens värdesätts, och där du kan växa tillsammans med oss!
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Som projektledare kommer du att leda och delta i projektteam för att säkerställa effektiv leverans och hög kvalitet.
   

  

 Du kommer även att:
   

  

* Bygga och underhålla relationer med kunder, kollegor och leverantörer.
* Kommunicera effektivt med olika intressenter och säkerställa att projekten håller tidsplan och budget.
* Koordinera och genomföra projekt, både interna och externa uppdrag.
* Arbeta med IT-infrastruktur och tekniska lösningar för att möta kundernas behov.


 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Du behöver ha minst 5-års erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som projektledare för tekniska IT-projekt inom IT-infrastruktur. Det är viktigt att du har erfarenhet av att självständigt driva hela projekt, och haft kontakt med beställaren.
   

  

* Relevant eftergymnasial utbildning
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med ITIL
* God kunskap om IT-infrastruktur, tex serverdrift, nätverk, lagring eller IT-arbetsplats
* Goda kunskaper i svenska i både tal och skrift


 Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav eftersom tjänsten kan vara placerad i säkerhetsklass.
   

  

**To applicants: please note that this position requires Swedish language skills on a professional level, verbally as well as in writing.**
**Vi är flexibla och hybrida!**
 Du kommer att ha en varierad vardag med möjligheten att utföra arbete hos kunden, på något av CGI kontor i Stockholm eller på distans från hemmet, beroende på kundens önskemål och krav. De flesta av våra konsulter arbetar i en hybridlösning, vilket innebär att du kan kombinera arbete på plats och på distans för att skapa en optimal balans mellan arbetsliv och privatliv.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

 Om du har några frågor eller funderingar, kontakta gärna rekryterande chef Marcus Grindange via mail: marcus.grindange@cgi.com.
   

  

**Mer information om våra förmåner:**
* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4 000 kr.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI.
* Trygg anställning: Våra medlemmar anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Föräldralön: Vi betalar upp till cirka 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.


**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: 3D Full-stack Engineer|Inter IKEA Data & Technology Range
description:
**Job ID:** R0009191


**Date posted:** 16/01/2025


Are you a Software Engineer or 3D Developer with a deep passion for crafting exceptional software? Are you a front end developer able to dive into 3D backend code? Or are you a 3D developer looking forward to dive into front end development? Do you thrive in a dynamic environment where your skills will help shape the future of home furnishing? If you've got the talent to create immersive and visually stunning 3D solutions, we want to connect with you!


As a 3D Full-stack Engineer in Inter IKEA Range, you will be working on projects that could change the world of affordable home furnishing – and in a team that values innovation and creativity.


You'll be working with modern technologies and frameworks, using your skills to create software products that are easy to use, visually stunning, and most importantly, accessible. In addition, you’ll be surrounded by a team who like to have fun, love a good laugh and celebrate success big time!


Your role will be central in supporting and developing the newly formed 3D functional area and implementing code for solutions and Platforms that drive our innovation forward. You will:

* Design and develop code for both out of the box or custom build 3D applications, including Javascript, C#, C++ ,Python to ensure timely delivery on agreed sprints and Epics.
* Support 3D-related business areas and product teams by translating user needs from business language into technical briefs for internal or external development and finally into code.
* Benchmark and analyze IT processes to identify development opportunities, ensuring alignment within the DevOps team and maintaining positive relationships with contractors, vendors and stakeholders.
* Work closely with various teams across IKEA to ensure our digital strategies are aligned, integrated and support the broader goals of the company.
* Act as a technical expert when dealing with third party suppliers and as a key developer amongst others for our core 3D solutions.

  

**Qualification**  

We’re looking for someone with the true passion for 3D, driven both by solving an end-to-end need as well as deep diving into specific problem areas. You should have:

* Deep understanding of computer graphics, offline and real-time as well as 3D asset pipelines.
* Significant experience with software product development with 3D/VFX workflow focus.
* General Knowledge of product development workflows from CAD (computer-aided design) utilizing tools such as Revit, SolidWorks, or CATIA to in depth understanding of 3D visualization, animation, and rendering processes, including 3D DCC´s (Digital Content Creation), V-Ray, Rendering queue management, and other key Software solutions.
* Good general understanding of 3D, CG and VFX pipelines, including asset creation, texturing, lighting, rigging and posing. Good understanding of Pixar´s USD (Universal Scene Description) and MaterialX node structure is a plus.
* A Platform and DevOps mindset towards securing operations of business-critical applications with a good understanding of Agile methodologies and experience working on Agile development teams.
* Educational Background: Degree in Digital Media, Interactive Media, Media Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.


We use technologies such as Azure, Terraform, Dockers, OpenAPI, Three JS, React, Javascript, Typescript, C++, MongoDB, Neo4J. If you don´t know them all no worries, as long as you are open to learning them!

 **More Information**  

This is a full-time position located in Malmö with occasional travel to Älmhult to support business needs. We are actively conducting ongoing interviews, so we encourage you to submit your application without hesitation. Questions about the recruitment process can be answered by AoRui via aorui.pu1@inter.ikea.com

*About Inter IKEA Group*


Inter IKEA Group is the group of companies that connects IKEA franchisees with range development and suppliers and aligns the overall IKEA strategic direction. All to create a better everyday life for the many people. The Group includes Inter IKEA Systems B.V. – the worldwide IKEA franchisor – as well as range development, Supply and certain industry activities.
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: ADAS Function Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Review platform level function design and system requirements. Conduct requirement analysis and decomposition. Create project specific system and subsystem solutions and requirements in SystemWeaver.
* Reflect the company DNA and user interface in the system solution
* Coordinate and handshake requirements with internal and external stakeholders
* Raise change requests for unique and modified implementations.
* Develop system and sub system level requirements and design verification method for the unique or modified solutions
* Responsible for fault tracing during the development and testing process, following up on issue resolution and acceptance, to ensure that the functionality is launched according to the project timeline.
* Support activities to refine and improve the the company way of working with requirements.
* Be part of / give input to sourcing activities

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* M.Sc or B.Sc. degree in electrical or automotive engineering or a related field.
* More than 3 years of experience working within the automotive industry as a Systems Engineer within the AD / ADAS domain
* Working level knowledge of requirements engineering ideally using the SystemWeaver tool chain
* Working level knowledge of Functional Safety with respect to ISO26262 and SOTIF
* Knowledge of Automotive electrical architectures and signal data base handling
* Knowledge of SW architecture (the different SW layers and the structure)
* Good English communication skills.

  

**Application deadline:** 21-01-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: System Verification Engineer [F/M/X]
description:
**Who are we?**
---------------

**Amaris Consulting** is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.  

  

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
  

  

**Brief Call**: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
  

  

**Interviews** (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
  

  

**Case study**: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
  

  

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
  

We look forward to meeting you!
**Job description**
-------------------

**Position Overview:** We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Senior Verification Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable automation frameworks for our software products. You will also be responsible for writing and executing automated test scripts, analyzing test results, and identifying and reporting defects. Your contributions will directly improve the quality and reliability of our software releases.


**Key Responsibilities:**


* Design, develop, and maintain automation frameworks using industry-standard tools and technologies (e.g., Selenium, Appium, JUnit, TestNG, Cucumber, Robot Framework).
* Write, execute, and maintain automated test scripts for various types of testing, including functional, regression, integration, and API testing.
* Analyze test results, identify and report defects, and track them to resolution.
* Collaborate with software developers, testers, and product managers to understand requirements and translate them into effective test automation solutions.
* Investigate and troubleshoot automation issues and implement solutions to improve test stability and efficiency.
* Stay updated on the latest advancements in automation testing tools, technologies, and best practices.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of our testing processes and methodologies.
* Mentor junior team members on automation testing best practices and techniques.

  


**Qualifications:**


* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* 5+ years of experience in software testing, with a strong focus on automation testing.
* Strong programming skills in C#, C++, Python, or other relevant languages.
* Experience with test automation frameworks is an added advantage.
* Familiarity with testing methodologies like Agile, Scrum, and DevOps.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Passion for quality and a strong desire to learn and grow.
* Experience with API testing tools like Postman, Rest Assured, or JMeter.
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines and tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or Azure DevOps.
* Experience with cloud-based testing platforms.
* Experience with performance and security testing.
* Relevant certifications (e.g., ISTQB) are a plus.

  


**What We Offer:**


* Opportunity to work with innovative automotive technologies.
* A collaborative and inclusive work environment.
* Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
* The chance to make a significant impact on the future of automotive safety and performance.


**Join Us:** If you are passionate about automotive technology and have the skills and experience to excel in this role, we encourage you to apply. Be part of a team that is driving the future of intelligent automotive solutions.

  


*Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.*
company_description: Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. It gathers more than 7,500 people across 5 continents and more than 60 countries.

title: DevOps Engineer/Architect
description:
Jobbeskrivning


Som DevOps Engineer och konsult hos oss ingår du i DevOps Teamet inom sektionen 'IT Architecture and Advisory'. Teamets uppdrag är att hjälpa olika befintliga och nya kunder att sätta upp sin infrastruktur baserat på projektspecifika behov.


Du kommer att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där du får möjlighet att arbeta med olika projekt/tekniska lösningar, utforska, designa och bygga arkitektur för olika typer av applikationer hos olika kunder.


Kvalifikationer


Matchar din profil nedan beskrivning?


Vi söker någon med nedanstående kunskaper och erfarenheter, men vi tror dock att du kan vara en intressant kandidat även om du inte uppfyller alla kriterier.

* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift
* Erfarenhet med andra publika molnplattformar som Azure, AWS eller/och GCP
* Erfarenhet av containers och molntekniker (t.ex. Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure)
* Flera års praktisk erfarenhet av Linux-hantering och skriptning och automation.
* Applikationsdistributionsarkitektur via Docker och TLS-certifikatshantering för produktionsmiljöer
* Kunskap inom nätverk, brandväggar och lastbalanserare
* Några års praktisk erfarenhet av Azure DevOps (infra), GitLab, Github eller relaterade tjänster.
* Erfarenhet av att designa och utveckla CI/CD-miljöer
* Erfarenheter av att designa, implementera och hantera CI/CD-pipelines på Gitlab, GitHub, Jenkins och Azure
* Erfarenhet av felsökning, t.ex. brandväggsinställningar, serverproblem, trafik mellan servrar
* Arkitekturkunskap om frontend-teknologier, backend-teknologier samt databaser och meddelandelösningar
* God förståelse för DNS, routing, lastbalansering, nätverk och brandväggsteknik


Vi lägger även stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper som vi tror bland annat kännetecknas av att du är en Team player som tycker om att ta ansvar, kan arbeta självständigt och har ett öga för detaljer.

  


Företagsbeskrivning


AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.


Ytterligare information


Vår enhet Digital Services verkar över hela utvecklingskedjan med experter inom projektledning, kravanalys, QA och test, systemutveckling, arkitektur, dataanalys och AI, cybersäkerhet m.m.


Vad erbjuder AFRY dig som anställd?


Vi har regelbundna träffar där temat varierar mellan kompetens och socialt utbyte, eller både och. En bra balans helt enkelt!


Du får du t.ex.:

* En AFRY Buddy som bollplank under din första tid som anställd
* Balans i arbetslivet med möjlighet till hybridarbete.
* Tillgång till Club AFRY där en bredd av spännande och underhållande aktiviteter för våra medarbetare anordnas - det finns något för alla! Läs gärna mer här.
* Konkurrenskraftiga förmåner gällande pension, friskvård och föräldraledighet reglerade i vårt kollektivavtal
* Företagsrabatter med externa partners genom vår förmånsportal Advantage You.

title: Electronic trading Devops engineer - Equities Execution Platform team \u007C SEB, Solna
description:
Would you like to be in a team of six highly skilled employees working in a fast-paced environment? We are now looking for a team member to the Equities Execution Platform team at SEB Technology to strengthen the technical support & development of the platform.  

  

SEB is a full-service investment bank that offers advisory and financing across all products and client segments. We are recognized as one of the leading Nordic banks within investment banking. Within Equities Execution we have a leading market share of institutional flow on Nordic exchanges, and we provide connectivity throughout Europe, North America & Asia.
### **About the role:**

* You will work in a fast-paced work environment and contribute to the continuous delivery of the Equities Execution trading systems.
* Provide end user support and have a very close collaboration with the trading desks and other business stakeholders
* Troubleshooting, system integration, maintenance, installation and configuration for our Equity execution trading systems.
* Implementing and overseeing continuous monitoring to ensure the stability and efficiency of our production environment.
* Collaborating with external vendors, cross-functional teams, other development units to deliver comprehensive solutions.

### **Our Ideal Candidate:**

* Relevant academic degree with focus on computer and systems science or within the financial sector.
* You have at least 2 years of experience from working in a support role and with system integration.
* Experience of working with trading products within Equities, Fixed Income or FX is meritorious.
* Knowledge of working with Trading applications, platforms, protocols, & containers.
* Especially: Ullink, network, FIX-Protocol, Exchange connections, Fidessa, Linux, OpenShift and Electronic Trading will also be meriting.
* You need to be a service-minded team-player eager to learn new things and able to take on multiple tasks.
* You have a customer focused attitude, is driven, structured and self-going
* You are highly motivated, positive and have a strong sense of responsibility and commitment.
* You have experience from or an interest in the Financial industry.
* You are proactive and contribute with ideas and suggested improvements on our platform and way of working.
* You have excellent communication abilities in both Swedish and English.
* You are familiar with the agile way of working.

### **What we offer:**

* Innovative project with highly motivating colleagues
* Exciting work environment with very close business contact
* Extensive training and great learning opportunities
* Agile and modern ways of working

**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.  

  

Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2025-02-21. If you have questions about the position, please contact Martin Strinnholm, Team Manager, at martin.strinnholm@seb.se.
**Learn more about working at SEB** www.sebgroup.com/career
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Senior Product Manager
description:
**We aim high. So do you.**  

At Volvo Cars, we have bold targets when it comes to innovation, sales and customer experience, and we’re developing new technologies to lead in safety, autonomous driving, and electrification. If you want to grow together with talented people creating a new automotive future, we have a job for you.

  


**Let's introduce ourselves**
-----------------------------



We are seeking a Senior Product Manager for our resource management product. In the Digital Core Platform / Developer Experience organization part of our goal is to enable and empower application teams to develop, deploy and operate their software in an efficient, inspiring, and safe manner. We target our platform products for a cutting-edge full life cycle management via GitOps declarative infra, that we complement with Backstage as the development portal to our users – the application development teams.

  

  

The resource management product provides a declarative (GitOps) means to managing resources such as databases, Kafka topics, firewall openings, compute/container namespaces etc. Using GitOps, the product orchestrates the full life cycle of the resources, which are integrated by the resource providers, e.g. the team who owns databases. Technologies such as Crossplane, the Kubernetes resource model and GitOps are in the core of the product.

  

  

This tech domain is evolving rapidly with monthly new strides, and we expect you to keep up with it to make sure we are using the benefits of advances both in the market and internally. We also expect you to advocate for modern software methodology inside and outside our organization.

  

  

The resource management teams are based out of Sweden, mainly Stockholm and Gothenburg, and we would like this role to be based in Stockholm. The team is working in a global environment with collaboration across geography, operational disciplines, and technology stacks.


**What you'll do**
------------------



You will be part of empowered cross-functional product teams of engineers and engineering managers with access to a data specialist who helps understand our users and our impact. You will develop the product strategy, do discovery and define the product roadmap based on an integrated understanding of user needs, business direction, anticipated technology trends, and the required changes. You will initiate and lead collaboration with other products in Platform as well as application development teams, i.e. our users.

  

  

You will be reporting to a Group Product Manager with whom you will help maintain the high-level strategy. As a member of the extended Product Management team, you can get further support and feedback from colleagues and together take part in reviewing and contributing to the Developer Experience area’s vision and roadmap.


**What you'll bring**
---------------------



You are an experienced product manager who has adopted a Lean-Agile mindset, applied servant leadership, has effective communication skills, understands the Empowered Product Team concept, and will collaborate well with Volvo Cars's internal stakeholders and users. We would like you to have a proven record of accomplishment when working with defining what makes a great cloud, Kubernetes or DevOps software platform product assortment, related user experience, and communicating that to the product team.  



You are excited about contributing to creating a best-in-class developer user experience, advocating user research based on user needs, technology field research and a data-inspired approach. You have a growth mindset and a proven history of converting learnings from insights into tangible product features that our users love. You can think end-to-end and understand the developers but also understand the strategic needs and constraints. Lastly, you are used to interacting with a wide set of stakeholders and getting buy-in for your ideas and roadmaps.


**Ready to Take the Next Step?**
---------------------------------

  

  

Please submit your application through our career page. Due to GDPR regulations, we’re unable to store or consider applications from other platforms. Make sure to submit your application in English.

  

  

Once your application is successfully submitted, you’ll receive a confirmation email. Applications are open until **13th of February 2025**. We’re excited to get to know you!

  


**Volvo Cars – driving change together**
----------------------------------------

  

  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.

  


And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: System Verification Engineer [F/M/X]
description:
Job description
  
  

**Position Overview:** We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Senior Verification Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable automation frameworks for our software products. You will also be responsible for writing and executing automated test scripts, analyzing test results, and identifying and reporting defects. Your contributions will directly improve the quality and reliability of our software releases.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Design, develop, and maintain automation frameworks using industry-standard tools and technologies (e.g., Selenium, Appium, JUnit, TestNG, Cucumber, Robot Framework).
  
Write, execute, and maintain automated test scripts for various types of testing, including functional, regression, integration, and API testing.
  
Analyze test results, identify and report defects, and track them to resolution.
  
Collaborate with software developers, testers, and product managers to understand requirements and translate them into effective test automation solutions.
  
Investigate and troubleshoot automation issues and implement solutions to improve test stability and efficiency.
  
Stay updated on the latest advancements in automation testing tools, technologies, and best practices.
  
Contribute to the continuous improvement of our testing processes and methodologies.
  
Mentor junior team members on automation testing best practices and techniques.
  
  

**Qualifications:**  

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  
5+ years of experience in software testing, with a strong focus on automation testing.
  
Strong programming skills in C#, C++, Python, or other relevant languages.
  
Experience with test automation frameworks is an added advantage.
  
Familiarity with testing methodologies like Agile, Scrum, and DevOps.
  
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
  
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  
Passion for quality and a strong desire to learn and grow.
  
Experience with API testing tools like Postman, Rest Assured, or JMeter.
  
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or Azure DevOps.
  
Experience with cloud-based testing platforms.
  
Experience with performance and security testing.
  
Relevant certifications (e.g., ISTQB) are a plus.
  
  

**What We Offer:**  

Opportunity to work with innovative automotive technologies.
  
A collaborative and inclusive work environment.
  
Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
  
The chance to make a significant impact on the future of automotive safety and performance.
  
  

**Join Us:** If you are passionate about automotive technology and have the skills and experience to excel in this role, we encourage you to apply. Be part of a team that is driving the future of intelligent automotive solutions.
  
  

Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.
  
  

Who are we?
  
Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7500 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.
  
  

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
  
  

**Brief Call:** Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
  
  

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
  
  

**Case study:** Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
  
  

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
  
We look forward to meeting you!
company_description: Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. It gathers more than 7,500 people across 5 continents and more than 60 countries.

title: DevOps Engineer/Architect
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**  

AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Som DevOps Engineer och konsult hos oss ingår du i DevOps Teamet inom sektionen 'IT Architecture and Advisory'. Teamets uppdrag är att hjälpa olika befintliga och nya kunder att sätta upp sin infrastruktur baserat på projektspecifika behov.


Du kommer att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där du får möjlighet att arbeta med olika projekt/tekniska lösningar, utforska, designa och bygga arkitektur för olika typer av applikationer hos olika kunder.

Vi söker någon med nedanstående kunskaper och erfarenheter, men vi tror dock att du kan vara en intressant kandidat även om du inte uppfyller alla kriterier.

title: Senior Operational Engineer (Storage)
description:
**Company Description**  

Vattenfall is a European energy company with approximately 21 000 employees. For more than 100 years we have electrified industries, supplied energy to people’s homes and modernized our way of living through innovation and cooperation. We are looking for talented individuals who, in addition to their passion for their own role, also have strong team spirit and want to contribute to supporting a meaningful corporate mission.

 **Job Description** **Data Centre (YIOD)**


The Vattenfall IT Data Centre department is accountable for Data Centres and Public Cloud services. Vattenfall IT has adopted a "cloud first" strategy. The Public Cloud Platform Services department is responsible for delivering Public Cloud services. For workloads that are not suitable for public cloud services, Vattenfall IT provides country-based Data Centres with traditional on-premise hosting platforms. Vattenfall IT is transitioning to Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) platforms, moving away from traditional hosting towards private cloud architectures and platform service delivery for workloads that require country or business-specific regulatory compliance.

**Private Cloud Platform Services (YIODW)**


Vattenfall IT Data Centre has established a new department to manage Private Cloud Platform Services. This department is responsible for overseeing the services, operations and ensuring the smooth functioning of the Private Cloud Platform. To streamline the operations further, the department has been divided into three sub-departments, each with a specific focus and responsibilities. The team primarily focuses on VMware, Windows, Linux server, and Storage service operations for the BLUE IT on-premise environments.

**YIODWS** is anoperations department responsible for BLUE VPC and traditional hosting service operations.

  

  

**What will you do?**


As our new Operational Engineer (Storage) you will be responsible for managing the storage solutions in the Vattenfall datacenters. The Operational Engineer drives complex changes, actively supports new implementations, and cares for service improvement through problem management.


Furthermore, the Operational Engineer has also responsibilities related to Servers, Floor and Hardware Management, virtual and cloud environment and interconnection with other systems (e.g. Network, Data Bases etc). The Operational Engineer is responsible for the storage administration, SW and HW maintenance, disaster recovery protection and supports the deployment of new services works on operation concepts and with system and security.  

  

Your tasks and responsibilities:

* Daily Maintenance of our Storage systems, including participation in on-call and daily shifts.
* Managing operational incidents including 1st and 2nd level, if needed.
* Planning, coordinating and working on changes based on incidents or improvements in our environment.
* Collaborating with other departments to ensure that IT operations are aligned with organisational goals and objectives.
* Automating our storage operations.
* Acting as a point of contact person for all technical questions regarding the storage related services and their components.
* Coordinating and executing activities for service lifecycle management (planning, migrations, installation, upgrade and decommission).
* Designing of infrastructure, based on application specific requirements.
* Development and maintenance of technical documentation
* Leading small size infrastructure initiatives
* Participating in projects as a Storage specialist.
* Joining improvement initiatives in the Storage area together with the team.
* Collaborating with other departments to ensure that IT operations are aligned with organisational goals and objectives.

**Location**  

Berlin, Amsterdam or Stockholm

 **Qualifications** **Who are you?**


You are an experienced specialist looking to step into the role of a Senior Engineer in the Data Centre.


You have experience with NetApp storage solutions in a large and complex IT environment.


You are driven by technical and operational challenges and have a strong desire to enable your team to consistently improve and deliver efficient, stable, compliant, and secure services.


You enjoy leading complex projects and you are able to plan your own work. You give advice for improvements that lead to a permanent solution of incidents or complex customer questions.


You work independently in an international team which meets more virtually than physically.


As our Senior Operational Engineer (Storage) you will bring:

* Bachelor’s degree in a related field (or equivalent work experience).
* Knowledge of IT service management frameworks such as ITIL .
* More than 7 years of Storage experience (NetApp).
* Very good knowledge of data centre related solutions and technologies (storage/FC switches/compute/networking/backup/security).
* Experience in managing and troubleshooting all the major storage protocols(NFS/CIFS/ISCSI/FC).
* Experience with Brocade SAN fabrics (zoning, upgrades, clean-up and troubleshooting).
* Experience with storage based DR and backup solutions.
* Good knowledge of operating systems (Windows/Linux) and VMware (ESXi, Vcenter, Datacenters, Connectivity, etc).
* Strong troubleshooting skills.
* Experience as project leader/ coordinator in complex business-critical projects.
* Motivating, energizing and driving team performance brings you satisfaction.
* You enjoy communicating and working closely with customers, stakeholders, and team members.
* You enjoy solving complex problems.
* Ability to manage multiple assignments, projects and priorities in a fast-paced environment.
* Fluency in English, both written and verbal. Knowledge of the local language in the chosen location (Germany, The Netherlands, Sweden) is a plus.

  

Next to this you bring:

* Experience with Ansible, shell scripting and other scripting knowledge.
* Knowlege with vSAN solutions.
* Experience in working with international team members.
* Experience with working with DevOps is a plus.
* Certifications in or storage technologies, VMware Cloud Foundation, Linux, Windows Server is a plus.
* Certifications in ITIL, Project Management is a plus.

  

**Additional Information** **Our offer**  

Good remuneration, a challenging and international work environment, and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues. We offer attractive employment conditions and opportunities for personal and professional development.  

  

**More Information**  

We welcome your application in English. We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website as we cannot guarantee that we will be able to process applications that are not made via our website.  

  

For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our recruiter Ewa Krajewska via ewa.krajewska@vattenfall.com


At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation.


The security of Vattenfall and its employees is essential. For that reason, a pre-employment screening will be part of your recruitment process. The screening is based on the role you will fulfill within Vattenfall. The screening will be performed by a third party, Validata.  

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**

title: Devops Engineer (Azure)
description:
Are you ready to take on a pivotal role in shaping the future of digital transformation? Join Multiply Teknik & IT, where technology meets innovation. We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Azure-based DevOps Engineer to support and enhance our efforts in building cutting-edge solutions for our clients.
  
**About Us:** At Multiply Teknik & IT, we’re redefining the future of technology by delivering advanced solutions that empower businesses. With products like our flagship platform VisFlow, we are revolutionizing real-time visualization and analytics. Now, we’re scaling up to meet exciting new challenges in Azure-based development and operations.
  
**Role Overview:** We are building a new Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) capability scheduled for deployment in 2025. To achieve this, we are expanding our talented team with a skilled Azure-based DevOps Engineer. This role involves designing, implementing, and maintaining robust CI/CD pipelines, leading DevOps efforts, and ensuring smooth operations for container-based applications within an Azure environment.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Develop and optimize automated CI/CD pipelines following DevOps principles.
  
Act as a DevOps Tech Lead, guiding the team in implementing best practices.
  
Manage and maintain container-based applications, with expertise in Kubernetes.
  
Support Azure services and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) operations.
  
Develop solutions in Java and provide technical leadership in integrating them into Azure infrastructure.
  
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and efficiency.
  
  

**Mandatory Requirements:****Experience: At least 5 years of experience in:**  

Developing automated CI/CD pipelines aligned with DevOps principles.
  
Acting as a DevOps Tech Lead or equivalent leadership role.
  
Managing container-based applications.
  
Developing solutions in Java.
  
  

**Azure Expertise: At least 3-4 years of experience in:**  

Managing Azure services.
  
AZ-204 is a requirement
  
Operating Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).
  
  

**Language Skills:**  

Proficiency in Swedish or Norwegian is a big plus.
  
English manadatory.
  
  

**Preferred Qualifications:****At least 4 years of experience in:**  

Infrastructure-as-Code tools (e.g., Bicep, Terraform).
  
Azure Functions.
  
Azure Pipelines.
  
Development or operational projects within public sector agencies.
  
**Bonus:** Knowledge of Managed Identity/Workload Identity and development competencies.
  
  

Why Join Us?
  
Work on innovative projects at the forefront of digital transformation.
  
Collaborate with a passionate team of professionals.
  
Gain exposure to the latest technologies and methodologies.
  
Flexible and supportive work environment.
  
  

**How to Apply:** If you’re a seasoned Azure-based DevOps Engineer looking for your next challenge, we want to hear from you! Please submit your CV and a brief cover letter outlining your experience and why you’re the perfect fit for this role to join@multiply.tech
  
Join Multiply — Where Technology Meets Innovation! Learn more about us at www.multiply.se and our product VisFlow at www.visflow.io.

title: Uppdragsledare – Örebro
description:
En större organisation söker en konsult för rollen som uppdragsledare, med särskilt fokus på ledning och styrning i projekt- och uppdragsledande roller. Konsulten förväntas ta huvudansvaret för att leda, samordna och driva uppdrag inom ett större program med inriktning på vidareutveckling av verksamhetens IT- och informationshantering. Vid behov kan uppdraget även omfatta arbete inom andra produktområden, projekt eller avdelningar.
  
Uppdraget kräver ett agilt arbetssätt, där snabba förändringar och korta iterationer är centrala. Konsulten ska kunna ta fram en välfungerande plan som hanterar en föränderlig miljö och skapar transparens i både arbetssätt och leveranser. En av de viktigaste uppgifterna är att, på ett engagerat och strukturerat sätt, leda kollegor mot uppsatta mål. Arbetet sker i högt tempo, och det är viktigt att snabbt kunna prioritera om när förutsättningarna ändras.
  
Konsulten förväntas vara tillgänglig för intervju under vecka 6 via digitalt möte.
  
Kravprofil (ska-krav)
  
**– Kompetensnivå 4 (9–12 år):** Konsulten ska ha arbetat i ledande projekt- eller uppdragsroller under minst 9 år.
  
– Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att leda omfattande projekt/uppdrag och förstudier i stora och komplexa organisationer: Organisationen bör ha flera organisatoriska nivåer samt omfattande beroenden mellan olika initiativ.
  
– Minst 5 års erfarenhet av verksamhets- och processutvecklingsarbete i stora och komplexa organisationer: Konsulten ska ha erfarenhet av att analysera, effektivisera och implementera förbättringar i miljöer med flera intressenter och komplexa beroenden.
  
– Kunskap och erfarenhet av hur statliga myndigheter eller offentlig förvaltning är organiserade och styrs: Förståelse för förvaltningskultur, regelverk och beslutsvägar inom offentlig sektor.
  
– Erfarenhet av projektledning/uppdragsledning i en agil miljö: Konsulten behöver behärska arbetssätt med korta iterationer, kontinuerliga leveranser och flexibilitet inför förändringar.
  
**– Förmåga att arbeta självständigt:** Rollen kräver att konsulten kan ta egna initiativ och driva processen framåt utan omfattande styrning.
  
**– Strategiskt perspektiv och lösningsfokus:** Konsulten ska kunna se helheten, hantera komplexa frågor och hitta hållbara lösningar.
  
**– Erfarenhet av att driva förändringsledningsuppdrag:** Innebär att kunna leda, driva och organisera förändringsarbetet samt stötta involverade parter under förändringsresan.
  
**– God kommunikativ förmåga:** Förmåga att samordna intressenter, kommunicera tydligt med kollegor och andra projektmedlemmar.
  
**– Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift:** Rollen kräver omfattande skriftlig och muntlig kommunikation.
  
Meriterande (bör-krav)
  
– Erfarenhet av Microsoft Azure DevOps Server (ADS) eller Team Foundation Server (TFS): Erfarenhet av att hantera ärenden, backlog och planering i dessa verktyg.
  
– Erfarenhet av att leda projekt inom säkerhetskänslig verksamhet: Vana att hantera sekretess, risker och krav relaterade till säkerhet.
  
Sammanfattningsvis
  
Uppdraget passar en uppdragsledare med gedigen erfarenhet av agil projektledning och förmåga att hantera komplexa verksamheter inom offentlig sektor. Rollen kräver både strategiskt tänkande och förmåga att agera snabbt och handlingskraftigt när omprioriteringar uppstår.
  
Om Rasulson Consulting
  
Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Senior Deep Learning Platform Engineer
description:
*Are you a Senior Deep Learning Platform Engineer**? Do you want to work with cutting-edge technology in a warm inclusive culture, with highly skilled people - and help save millions of lives in the process? Apply today - no CV needed, all we need is your name, email and phone number! We'll cover the rest later.*  



#### **Insights from the team**


Our team is responsible for the design, setup, operations, and continuous development of a large-scale compute and storage environment for Deep Learning and Machine Learning. This infrastructure supports the development of Zenseact's autonomous driving technology.


In the team, we prioritise sharing knowledge and learning from one another every day. We strive to make data-informed decisions while remaining pragmatic, accepting that today’s best decision may be improved tomorrow. By addressing both operational challenges and long-term design goals, we continuously refine the system architecture for Deep Learning based on user feedback. As a central hub for software and data flow, we work closely with numerous groups, users, and stakeholders daily.

#### **Your mission and day-to-day tasks**


You will collaborate in an agile team with IT colleagues in Sweden and interact with external partners. Your decisions will have a significant impact, and you will be trusted and empowered to solve challenges to deliver the IT services and solutions the business needs. You’ll work to standardize and automate processes, ensuring a Deep Learning Infrastructure environment that is easy to monitor and maintain.

**Your tasks will include:**

* Collaborating with Deep Learning and Machine Learning developers to improve methods, workflows, application optimisation, and automation, enhancing user experience and efficiency.
* Acting as a Subject Matter Expert in internal and external IT projects for Deep Learning and Machine Learning.
* Partnering with external service providers to implement standards, troubleshoot advanced issues, and review/sign off Root Cause Analysis reports.

### **What’s in it for you**

* Work at the forefront of tech in one of Sweden’s biggest and most interesting, challenging and dynamic AI/ML-companies.
* Collaborate with highly skilled, innovative, creative and smart people.
* Work with people from all over the world, close to what science just came up with.
* Enjoy a flexible work approach and a genuinely good work/life balance.

#### **Qualifications & experience**


You are motivated to learn and grow, with experience administering Deep Learning and Machine Learning Infrastructure in enterprise environments using modern DevOps tools. You are skilled at collaborating with customers, suppliers, and colleagues to achieve shared goals.


To succeed in this role, we value:

* 3+ years of experience providing solutions for large IT environments, especially those focused on Deep Learning and Machine Learning.
* Advanced Linux experience, such as working as a system engineer.
* A broad understanding of system-level solutions, with expertise in the technical implementation of large-scale data centers, including storage, backup, and compute.
* Proven experience in enabling and optimising infrastructure platforms to meet diverse needs (e.g., fast, flexible, cost-efficient systems).
* The ability to gather and translate requirements into actionable solutions for Deep Learning and Machine Learning environments.

**Nice to have**

* Expertise in large-scale data processing, including networks, servers, clients, and storage.
* Familiarity with tools and technologies such as:
* Hierarchical and parallel file systems (e.g., Lustre, GPFS).
* Batch systems (e.g., PBS, SLURM, SGE).
* Identity management systems (e.g., Active Directory, SAML, OAuth).
  




#### **More about Zenseact**

 **Our software makes a difference.**  

Using AI-based technology to create the ultimate driver support, we’re fighting to end car accidents and make roads safe for everyone. Every year, around 1,4 million people die in traffic while approximately 50 million people get injured. Many get disabled as a result of their injury. We can do better.

**One purpose, one product.**  

We’re a software company dedicated to revolutionizing car safety. By designing the complete software stack for autonomous driving and advanced driver-assistance systems, we’re fighting to end car accidents and make roads safe for everyone. Zenseact was founded by Volvo Cars, and the teams are based in Gothenburg and Lund, Sweden, Munich in Germany and Shanghai, China. When we aim for zero accidents faster, we strive to speed up the transition to safe automation. This is essentially achieved by making cars updatable – like a computer or a phone. With regular software updates, a vehicle can be made safer long after its production. By accelerating improvement loops, shortening development cycles, and deploying high-capacity software quickly, we can make cars safer, and faster.

**Culture with people at heart**  

To achieve our mission of saving lives and ending traffic accidents we must go where nobody has before. It requires us to venture into the unknown, pioneering new technology and pushing the frontier of autonomous driving. While there’s no denying our determination and expertise, we must stand united to succeed. By fostering a culture of support and enablement – a place of psychological safety where all of us can thrive – everything else will follow. We call this a **people-at-heart culture.** This culture means caring. It means the company cares about me, and we care about one another. It means sharing, so we give each other energy and have fun together. Our culture is also about belonging. It’s important to feel at home and that we can be ourselves at work. Finally, a people-at-heart culture means well-being. So, we enjoy the flexibility needed to be and do our best – at work and in life.

*Zenseact works proactively to create a culture of diversity and inclusion, where individual differences are appreciated and respected. To drive innovation we see diversity as an asset, which means we value and respect differences in gender, race, ethnicity, religion or other belief, disability, sexual orientation or age, etc.*  

  

*Interviews are held continuously, so we highly recommend that you submit your application at your earliest convenience.*

title: Scrum Master
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Ensuring project objectives, road maps and scope are agreed and continually prioritized in alignment with program strategy
* Overseeing project execution, including release and deployment activities, and ensure deliverables are completed in timely fashion meeting quality criteria and applicable KPIs
* Motivating people and building high-performing teams
* Managing risks and dependencies, developing contingency plans to mitigate open issues
* Collaborating to create optimal execution setups and organizing efficient ways of working in close coordination with key stakeholders
* Running key ceremonies under established program governance and provide supporting structures for effective communication and reporting
* Interacting with senior stakeholders, both business-facing and on the IT side, managing expectations and securing shared buy-in
* Fostering collaboration and steering teams towards culture of continuous improvements, knowledge sharing and the adoption of best practices
* Coaching and mentoring team members, establishing feedback loops and encouraging constant learning
* Experience in SAFe methodology and Credit Risk domain knowledge

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Minimum 3-5 years of Scrum Master and/or delivery management experience
* Accustomed to work in large and complex IT architecture landscapes
* Experience in Financial Services, preferrable in the Credit risk domain and more specifically Risk models (preferable)

  

  

**Key qualities:**

* Proactive, curious and a positive can-do attitude, embraces continuous improvements
* Strong stakeholder management experience and effective communication skills
* Takes ownership to resolve blockers impediments
* Hands on experience on Jira setup, confluence and other relevant SDLC tools

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 18-01-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Testledare - Automation
description:
***Är du en erfaren och passionerad inom automatiserad testning - Ta reda på hur vi kan ge dig den framtid du vill ha!***

**Rollen**
----------

**Hos oss har du en central roll i att säkerställa programvarans kvalitet och funktionalitet. Ditt huvudansvar är att automatisera testprocessen. Här ingår att planera, organisera, leda testprocessen och kommunicera testresultaten till relevanta intressenter﻿**

**I rollen kommer du in tidigt in i projekten med uppgiften att förstå verksamhetens mål och behov för att omsätta detta till den lösningsarkitektur som ger mest värde till verksamheten. ﻿﻿Du arbetar i tät samverkan med både expertkollegor från Capgemini och kunden, tillsammans med utvecklingsteam, produktägare och kundens övriga intressenter.**  

  

**Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande och spännande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas.**  

**Vi arbetar professionellt och metodiskt i en lärande miljö och både din teamchef och ditt kompetensteam stöttar dig och din utveckling som konsult. Vi träffas ofta för att utbyta erfarenheter, lära oss nya saker i en bransch som ständigt förändras – och inte minst för att ha kul tillsammans!**

  

**Din profil: ﻿**

* **Flytande i svenska både muntligt och skriftligt.**
* **Du har +5 års erfarenhet inom mjukvarutestning.**
* **Erfarenhet av automatiserings verktyg som Jenkins, SoapUI eller liknande.**
* **Programmeringskunskaper i Java/JavaSCRIPT, Phyton eller liknande.**
* **Van vid agila metoder och arbetssätt.**
* **DevOps.**
* **ISTQB Certified - Tester Foundation**
* **Är noggrann och uppmärksam på detaljer.**
* **Nyfiken på att arbeta i internationella miljöer.**

  

**Meriterande**

* **Erfarenhet från konsultbranschen**
* **Erfarenhet av att leda testteam﻿**

  

**Vi erbjuder**

* **En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kundnöjdhet. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste tekniktrenderna och vara omgiven av skickliga kollegor. På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med högt kundfokus, en samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerlig lärande och utveckling.**
* **Vårt Test Team i Stockholm består av medarbetare som levererar till publika och privata sektorn. Vi erbjuder även ett lokalt och internationellt nätverk för testare i Norden och världen så det finns alltid någon som kan hjälpa oss i det dagliga arbetet om vi behöver stöd i form av kunskap eller guidning för att lyckas leverera till våra kunder.**

  

**Din kompetens utveckling**

* **Spännande karriärmöjligheter lokalt och internationellt, och fantastiska nätverk av expertis.**
* **Som anställd hos oss blir du blir en del av en vass, teknik- och affärsfokuserad gemenskap, Här kan du bla välja mellan 250 000 kurser som täcker det mesta, inkl certifieringar.﻿**
* **Du kommer återkommande ha en dialog med din teamchef om hur du vill och hur du utvecklas avseende uppdrag, utbildningar och kundnöjdhet
﻿**

  

**Våra värderingar**

* **Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun**
**Om Capgemini ﻿
﻿**  

**Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.**

  

**Get The Future You Want |** **www.capgemini.com**  

  

**#LI-JK1**
company_description: Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology.
